title.rendered: Falanx Cyber Defence proudly sign the Armed Forces Covenant

content.rendered:
Falanx Cyber Defence are proud to show our support for the Armed Forces by signing the Armed Forces Covenant (AFC). The AFC represents a promise by the nation that those who serve or have served, and their families, are treated fairly. All 407 local authorities in mainland Great Britain and 4 Northern Ireland councils have pledged to uphold the AFC. To date over 1,500 organisations have signed the covenant, and we are proud to now be one of them.

“Falanx Cyber Defence recognises the continued commitment and dedication that our Armed Forces provide on a daily basis. The AFC, which we have recently signed, represents the positive culture and support that is available for members of our Armed Forces within the company”, explains Head of Penetration Testing, Tim Wright.

You can read our pledge here and find out more about the AFC at www.armedforcescovenant.gov.uk
